root: ^Hello Traverler good to see you, let's get straight to business. We have a major problem, 7 monsters somehow got into the city's walls and we need them gone before they get to the town.
^We were able to quickly put some walls up to slow them down but unfortunally they were put up at random, creating a maze...
^Could you please go in and eliminate them before they cause too much trouble?

c-0: ^Go straight behind you, take a left, and up the stairs.
c-1: ^We signed a contract, theres no way out of this! Go straight behind you, take a left, and up the stairs.
c-2: ^PERFECT! Thank you so much, well have construction head straight over to figure out where they are coming from!
